## Host.unload() method

Unload all extensions and remove their frames/workers. Use this to unmount a UI or when switching to a different extensible UI.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unload(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
